bad_args_user: Wrong number of arguments. There must only be one argument (The username or the id)
unknown_username: The username is unknown. Please make sure the user has at least sent a message with the new username

authorize.success: The user has been authorized successfully

unauthorize.success: The user has been unauthorize successfully

promote.success: The user has been promoted successfully

demote.success: The user has been demoted successfully

commands.start: Hello! Send a link from any famous video platform, I'll try to send the video back!
commands.help: Send a link from any famous video platform, I'll try to send the video back
